title: Can't login into alfa and the game is bigger than my screen :/
body: Every time i try login into the alfa client 1. I can only see a part of the login bars and when i do log in it says something about cant login in please try again later and 2. i cant even see that properly because i the client is bigger than the actual screen. Please help.

replies.body: Just as a heads up, we have limited troubleshooting steps for the Alpha Client since it's in Alpha, but I'd like to do my best to help you out. In order to get a better idea of what's going on, can you upload a screenshot of the issue to imgur or gyazo, then send me a link? Thanks~
